name: Public endpoint should be disabled for MySQL servers

properties.displayName: Public endpoint should be disabled for MySQL servers
properties.description: Public network access(public endpoint) property has to be disabled to improve security and ensure your Azure Database for MySQL can only be accessed from a private endpoint. This configuration strictly disables access from any public address space outside of Azure IP range, and denies all logins that match IP or virtual network-based firewall rules
